alert.note: Alert for Absaroka Mountains; Wind River Mountains East (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 06 at 7:40PM MST until January 08 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches across higher terrain Friday afternoon and night. Winds increasing late tonight, gusting as high as 65 mph will produce blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Eastern Wind River Mountains and Absaroka Mountains, including South Pass/Red Canyon and Chief Joseph Highway. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel over passes will be difficult. Visibility could be down to a quarter mile at times. People recreating in the backcountry could become disoriented.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, water, and a charger for your cell phone in case of an emergency. Call 5 1 1, to get the latest road conditions.

area.areaDesc: Absaroka Mountains; Wind River Mountains East
